This translation was made by a fan of this comic. Nobody made any money out of it. It's the work of an aficionado, without much knowledge of graphic design, and does not intend to be a substitute for the original work. I just want to fill the hole that the author leaves not offering translations of his work into other languages than English.

===============================

Have fun and share.
